channel.title: Please help with making NPCs shout! [I'm new one]
channel.description: Hey everyone!!! I'm new in coding, I started with Moon-Space ( some kind of DeltaScape ) 317 protocol server and I want to make some NPCs to say something. I used this tut http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,440101.0.html but it didn't help, cause I can't find this npcs[i].getnextnpcmovement()... Please help!!!

item.title: Please help with making NPCs shout! [I'm new one]
item.dc:creator: @kneistol kneistol
item.description:
@kneistol wrote:

npcs[i].getnextnpcmovement()

and if that don’t work

npcs

Read full topic
item.source: Please help with making NPCs shout! [I'm new one]
